title: Photography: an introduction
creator_credit: Coast Telecourses USA, ABC-TV (Australia) and Michael Hollander
brief_description: This series forms part of an Open Learning Unit offered by RMIT. It presents the technical principles of photography, the mechanics of the camera, the chemicals and physical reactions which produce a permanent image, the uses of various kinds of photographic equipment and techniques for producing better quality photographs.
